website_summaries.verdict: If you’re looking for the ultimate gift for a young dinosaur fanatic, you can’t beat the variety, value, sturdiness, and fun factor of these 5 rubbery dinosaurs.
pros: Includes triceratops, t-rex, spinosaurus, brachiosaurus, and gigantosaurus

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the dinosaur lover!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my 3 year old’s birthday gift, after having seen the high reviews from other users. I am using my 14 year old’s photo for size reference. My son is in a Dino phase and these are well worth the money. They are perfect in size and large for him. They are a softer rubber type material and have vibrant colors. The dinosaurs are very detailed.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome - soft, squishy and smell-free.
customer_reviews.text: My biggest fears when purchasing squishy soft toys like these is the following : are they hard or soft; do they smell like they’ve been bathed in chemicals? This set of Dino’s is awesome - they are soft, squishy, do not smell, packaged in a very nice white cardboard box with a classy label. What a find! Super Happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DSK3

customer_reviews.title: Great for toddlers and preschoolers!
customer_reviews.text: My nephew is going to love these. They are realistic looking, nice big sized and a softer squeezable plastic. Perfect for dinosaur loving toddlers and preschoolers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: My kids (1 and 3) love these dinosaurs and I love that they aren’t hard as rocks! The material is soft enough they they can throw them at eachother or my floors without damage but hard enough that they keep their shape and stand up well. I love toys that don’t need batteries and spark a kid’s imagination and these are just that!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Deere

customer_reviews.title: Good quaility
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews before purchasing so i knew they were going to be smaller than most of the ones we already have. My son just loves playing with dinosaurs and I especially love the big soft plastic ones. They came fast. The price was good. The panting details and bright colors are fun for imaginative play. Also as another person mentioned in a review they came in a nice white box inside the amazon box that had a picture of the dinosaurs on it. I like that it was nicely packed if i wanted it to be a great birthday gift. Would recommend others to buy this toy.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: They are big, great size for the money
customer_reviews.text: Decent sized Dino toys! They are actually for Christmas so my son hasn’t played with them yet. But they are great quality, well painted. Softer plastic, that can be squeezed. Would highly recommend. Axl will love them Christmas morning!
customer_reviews.author: Crishultz

customer_reviews.title: Knock off of what is advertised.
customer_reviews.text: When I saw the spinosaurus measurements, i thought the rest of the dinos would have been larger since they are much larger dinos. Nope. The spino dino is the largest one and the rest are smaller. The feet are all bulging out on the bottom so they dont stand up. They are not at all realistic looking and look like my toddler painted them. Durable plastic but they have a hole in the chest, heads up.
customer_reviews.author: Hailey

customer_reviews.title: Better quality than you expect for the price you pay!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for a Grandma Party for my grandsons. They were of better quality than I expected for the reasonable price I paid for them. I was so pleasantly surprised when I opened the box to find not only were the colors vibrant and appropriate but they were not a rigidly hard plastic they are soft to the touch. I was pleased in every way with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: DeAnna Calvin

customer_reviews.title: its just what i was looking for.. but not for the money...
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly what I was searching for... squishy giant dinosaur toys for my 2 1/2 year old. But the price seems a bit steep for what it is. its just some really cheap made in china toys, but since there about 6 dollars a piece, it wasn't really a value purchase. I would expect anything this cheap would cost about 2 to 3 dollars a piece. But... all in all, it gets the job done. I didn't want my kid be playing with my papo figures that I wanted as display. =)
customer_reviews.author: Shoparuu

customer_reviews.title: Loooove
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea what some commenters are sayimg about the figures not looking realisitc. They are Soo real looking. I like that the material is plastic but sort of plushy. They're huge. My son loves them Soo demg much. I got it for Christmas wayyy ahead of time but husband and I agreed that we had to give him one
customer_reviews.author: jannelle

customer_reviews.title: Buy buy buy for boys
customer_reviews.text: My twins are ecstatic over these and they have half the jurassic world ones too. However these guys rank same level for my six year old boys. Pull therm across the floor,battle dinos, etc.....whatever the kids do,these are durable hard thick plastic. It'll take lots to damage them. Also the details and construction is on point. These dinos have impressive colors, and great attention to details like making sure specific dinos have what they need to classify their breeds. I bought two boxes for the price. Definite recommendation
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sturdy yet flexible dinos!
customer_reviews.text: These toys are perfect for kids 2 and up! They are a great size and I love how bendy yet sturdy these toys are. They were an instant hit with the toddlers I gave them to and even after falling on top of the toys nobody was hurt (not so with hard plastic). These kiddos even demanded to sleep with their dinos so they were clearly loved from the start. I also appreciated that each dinosaur is balanced well and can stand easily on its own, which hard plastic ones struggle to do. I will definitely be a repeat customer!
customer_reviews.author: Book Lover in OH

customer_reviews.title: Fun to play with and great quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son after looking in stores for plastic dinosaur toys and couldn’t find something that I believed to be safe for my little boy. Well, I must say that I am very impressed. These are the perfect size, stand easily, just the right amount of “squish” to them. I ordered another set of these the same night after receiving these for a gift. Thank you, Boley for creating these magnificent Dino’s. I find myself wanting to play with them too, lol.
customer_reviews.author: Margjodo

customer_reviews.title: Great Dinos
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a birthday gift for a 2 year old and they are FANTASTIC. They are wonderfully soft but still detailed like plastic dinosaurs. It's exactly what I was looking for because he's still in the "throw everything" phase and I didn't want him to be able to hurt anyone with a harder plastic. They come in a nice little box that I'll add some tissue paper to and then wrap. And there is absolutely no smell at all to them - plastic or otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: CM Mills

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this set
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for the two kids (siblings) I am gifting this to- one is two, the other almost 4. They really like dinosaurs so this is perfect for them. I like the size a lot- big but not too big for little kids and thank goodness they are light and a bit soft with no hard edges- so no worries about eyes being poked out or if in a squabble one gets hit in the head- no injury should occur. That would be a concern with heavy, hard plastic. Plus they are not cheap looking at all- great color & look real- of course not an exact scientific replica but they look real enough for young kids.
customer_reviews.author: mariana

customer_reviews.title: These guys are DINOmite!
customer_reviews.text: These are big, SOFT, and realistic looking! I bought these for a 4 year old birthday gift and they turned into a favorite! The size makes them so much more fun than hand size mini dinos and the softness (which was a happy surprise) makes them easy for him to carry (and sleep in bed with). I definitely recommend these for your little Dino lover! You get 5 dinos, too—that’s a great value for the price and quality.
customer_reviews.author: SassyAthlete

customer_reviews.title: i love boley dinosaurs
customer_reviews.text: i love boley dinosaurs. they are really good quality and are soft and not solid in the middle. the only issue that i had with this particular boley dinosaur that I ordered is the coloring is a little different then the picture. The one received isn't as real looking like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: J. nariyoshi

customer_reviews.title: Realistic and Large Dinosaur Toys
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my grandson who is 9 months but will give them to him for his birthday. They are advertised as non-toxic and they are very well made. They are large, 10-12", and realistic.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Purchased again for 2nd Grandson
customer_reviews.text: These are THE perfect Dinos for a toddler with a budding interest in dinosaurs! They are soft so not the typical hard dinosaurs that you see and are appropriate for older kids. No dangerous pointy tails or sharp teeth. Grandson #1 LOVED these little guys so when the 2nd grandson showed an interest in Dinosaurs I knew right where to go for another set! A MUST for any small dinosaur lover! Very pleased Grandma :-)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase. Realistic, big and soft.
customer_reviews.text: I looked for dinosaurs of this kind for months as I was looking for realistic look, durable, big and affordable. I used these for my kids dinosaur theme birthday party. They worked great except some of them would not stand up on their own, was disappointing but kids still loved them. They are big but great size for little hands. They are also softer than all the others I had been interested in. So if a child happens to throw it, it will not hurt too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Margie V.

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality - Waited until price dropped
customer_reviews.text: I bought these when they were on sale. I had this item on my wishes list for several weeks before it finally went down to a price I could afford. My son saw similar dinosaurs at Lakeshore Learning store but they were overpriced. I’m glad I waited for these. My son loves them. They are great quality and a decent size. I did not see any information about the name of the dinosaurs, so that would have been nice. Otherwise, very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Janneth

customer_reviews.title: Amazing gift!
customer_reviews.text: My son loved these! I have a dino obsessed autistic son and I got these for a Christmas gift. GREAT BUY!! I bought the 5pc and the price was amazing considering my local stores had just one dino ranging from 10-20 each. The material is perfect for us, my kiddo has sensory issues so he does alot of tapping and banging of his Dino's the material on these (squeezable rubber) makes it so it's not as loud, huge plus for this Mom. The sizes were big. Highly recommend purchasing these.
customer_reviews.author: AutismMom❤️

customer_reviews.title: 99% satisfied
customer_reviews.text: 99% satisfied! These are a great size, BIG, soft and not hard plastic. perfect for kids of all ages. Note: they are a little smaller than the dimensions listed. The biggest one (T-Rex) is 14" nose to tail diagonal (not width of standing toy). The Spinosaurus pictured at 9" tall x 15" wide standing is only 8.5" tall x 11" wide standing (14" diagonal). Still a great size though.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Chavez

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect for all ages because they're soft and large enough ...
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for all ages because they're soft and large enough where you don't worry about a small child eating it. I originally got these for my 3 year old to play with and he loves it but my almost 1 year old has also gotten a hold of them and loves playing with them too. And I don't have to worry that if my older son may "accidentally" hit my younger one with it, it will not hurt him. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: CdS_OlS_SkS

customer_reviews.title: Great toys. Best gift ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set as a birthday gift for a toddler on his 2nd birthday. He loves dinosaurs! “T Rex!! T Rex!!!” when he opened the box. He was an ecstatic little boy. He took each dinosaur out of the box, checked it out really well and lined them up on the ground. He was absolutely adorable and absolutely thrilled! These were the “HIT“ of the party!
customer_reviews.author: Jen C

customer_reviews.title: Love them sad about size
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing dinosaurs, squishy and perfect for my preschooler and toddler. The only thing I was a little sad about was the size; I honestly thought they’d be the mega ones. I had bought a T-Rex from a local bomgarrs and it’s huge compared to these. Either way the size won’t bother my review they are still a good size.... will most likely buy more for their birthdays since they are both into dinosaurs.
customer_reviews.author: Keely

customer_reviews.title: Rawr
customer_reviews.text: You guys these are adorable! My toddler went crazy when he saw them. They’re hollow & not hard plastic so no poking yourself in the eye accidents because they are squeezable. They are big as described so they won’t quickly become lost dog chew toys! I love that they have the names on the bottom of each dinosaur!! Awesome set for any Dino lover!
customer_reviews.author: Dariella

customer_reviews.title: They Were a HIT !
customer_reviews.text: My only regret was that I didn't buy two. I have 6 grandchildren ages 10 to 3 and they were wrestling over these dinosaurs last night. They are sturdy, realistic and well made. I will definitely have to buy another set and would recommend these to anyone looking for a great addition to their Nana toy box or as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Whitehousebabe

customer_reviews.title: Awesome HUGE Dinosaur toys!
customer_reviews.text: These big guys are awesome!!! My son was asking for a dinosaur cake for his b-day and along side the cake he got these cool, huge dinosaurs and he was uber excited and can’t stop playing with them so much so that he makes so to line them up on his nightstand before going to bed! They are super durable and kids will love them!
customer_reviews.author: Mark V

customer_reviews.title: 2.5 year old son still loves it
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our 1.5 year old son, a year later he is still playing with it. Slightly larger, which is cooler (than smaller sets), my older daughters even put their barbies on top to ride them during their play time as well. Kid loves it, works, has not broken after 1 year, what more can I ask from a toy: five stars. If they had a different set of dinosaurs I would buy them as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jorrior

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as promised
customer_reviews.text: They were exactly what I was looking for. Squishy soft but durable rubber dinosaurs that looked real.....and these are it. The boys love them (4 and 19 months) and they are big enough that I won't step on them. They all stood upright and the name was clearly printed on the bottoms of their feet.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Alger

customer_reviews.title: Like the look and feel
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the dinosaurs for my grandsons’ upcoming birthday. I really like the look and feel of them. They are nicely colored and have a plush feel (not the hard plastic). He loves dinosaurs and I think he is definitely going to enjoy these. I hope they are durable and sturdy enough for his little rough play. If not, I will definitely update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Smith

customer_reviews.title: I think they will be loved!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for my toddler Grandson, but one of the Dino’s has a short leg and can’t stand. I was going to return it, but decided to make a learning moment out of it instead. It’s ok to be different. My Grandson will encounter many “different” people over his lifetime, and now hopefully he will understand that “it’s ok to be different.”
customer_reviews.author: Sharon A Lascano

customer_reviews.title: Great toddler toy
customer_reviews.text: I love that these dinosaurs are a soft plastic. The size and foam material are just right for my 1.5 year old to play with safely. My only complaint is that they are pretty expensive. I was hoping to get the set that included the Stegosaurus but I would have had to get the 5 pack which was even more expensive. I would like if there were some different dino set options.
customer_reviews.author: Megan S

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Large dinosaur package for kids!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for a granddaughter because I thought she might play with them. We were playing with some of her other toy figures and she was getting pretty aggressive so I thought I would buy her some dinosaur figures and let her see some real monsters. They look pretty sturdy and durable for young kids to play with. I hope she enjoys them.
customer_reviews.author: Doc Savage

customer_reviews.title: Soft but not too squishy dinosaurs
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for soft but not super squishy dinosaurs, you know so they are realistic but not going to hurt anyone when they get chucked across the room. So I'm very pleased with these so far, my daughter will be getting them for her birthday and I'm sure these will be a stable in our toys from then on
customer_reviews.author: Carlyn Warnock

customer_reviews.title: Best fun toy, adults and kids alike loved!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 1 yr old grandsons birthday, he dropped all his toys to play with these when opened! So realistic, soft, larger than most, had the name of each on its foot. Great learning too. Best part of this gift is every adult at my grandsons party loved and played with the dinosaurs! LoL
customer_reviews.author: Maryann Tampourlos

customer_reviews.title: Large but also kind of squishy inside!
customer_reviews.text: My two year old freaked when he opened these on his birthday! I should have known they would be quality since they are Boley! The dinosaurs are big but also soft inside, not like those super hard plastic toys that you eventually get in the face or knee caps. Just great overall experience; inexpensive, great quality and nicely packaged.
customer_reviews.author: ChinaCatSunflower

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: These dinosaurs are exactly what I was looking for! They are large and the plastic is soft. My grandson just turned 2 & is obsessed with dinosaurs. Those I found in local stores were hard and hurt if hit by them. This set is so soft yet sturdy. I like that they are larger than most I've seen. I would highly recommend this set of dinosaurs!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great set of dinosaurs!
customer_reviews.text: My two year old grandson loves dinosaurs and has several dinosaur toys, but these are by far his favorites. He likes the larger size. The coloration is very nice and I like that they are not hard plastic and have a bit of squeezability. They are holding up very well to some rugged dinosaur play. I recommend these and am pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ripshin Rose

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Preschool grandson is fascinated with dinosaurs. He carries these around everywhere--very sturdy. I bought a second set he could have one at home and another when he visits Grandma. They are a great value for the money. I would highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: reader

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Come in a cute box ready to gift. I did check them out first though and they are nicely made with a few details that could have been better for the price. However in the end the kids will love these. They are made of a soft type rubber and won't break any heads!! So more enjoyment and less injuries ;)
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M.

customer_reviews.title: Love these Dinos!
customer_reviews.text: These are the BEST my almost 2 year old absolutely loves these. They are softer and rubbery so they are great for younger dino fans but will last my son a couple years if properly cared for. Would highly recommend for any toddler who loves dinosaurs.
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I got these as a gift for my 3 year old for Christmas. She loves them. I got the 5 pack and I am so happy I did. They will last a long time I can tell. I appreciate that they are soft and not rigid and hard. They stand up very well on her shelf. I love these dinosaurs.
customer_reviews.author: JJ2day

customer_reviews.title: Great quality fun dinos
customer_reviews.text: These are great! My 2 year old daughter loves them and knows all their names. They’ve become the centerpiece of her obsession with dinosaurs and they’re sturdy enough to stand up to that level of attention. Would highly recommend for any young dinosaur fanatic!
customer_reviews.author: T.S. Idiot

customer_reviews.title: My dinosaur wont stand up. Sad toddler.
customer_reviews.text: One dinosaur so miss shapen it wont stand up. Sad. Poor quality which is surprising for this brand that typically receives high ratings.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: We looked around for dinos for several months! For the price, gave these a shot. They are soft enough that if someone got one thrown at them, no damage would be done. Easy enough for the kids to grasp. These are not hard plastic. But enough plastic to make them seem more realistic. Highly recommend. Going on several months, and they still look brand new. Purchased for 2&3 yo boys.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren H.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic group of large dinosaurs!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my son for Christmas (from Santa). He absolutely LOVES it! He's 3.5 years old & obsessed with dinosaurs! They are large & really light for the size. What a fantastic collection! I would absolutely order them again.
customer_reviews.author: Peachie

customer_reviews.title: Quality meets affordability
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of searching for large-size, affordable dinosaurs that weren’t too hard. These were perfect. I was really pleased with the quality once I had them in my hand. My grandsons loves playing with them and I’m not worried that anyone will get hurt if they get clobbered by a dino.
customer_reviews.author: Great American History

customer_reviews.title: Toddler Approved!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking EVERYWHERE for dinosaurs like this for my 2 year old son and 4 year old daughter. These are absolutely perfect! The material is flexible and I'm not scared that they're going to break anything major or break our faces if they throw them by accident. I also really like that on the feet of each dino it says what type of dino it is. Overall, this is a great gift/toy for little onesa
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Lee

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toys
customer_reviews.text: Great looking\feeling toys. My husband bought these for our son and he seemed to really like them. Nice detail and very nice size to. Soft kinda rubber feeling which is a plus since my boy seems to hit himself with almost every other toy.
customer_reviews.author: Atlas

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set of dinosaurs
customer_reviews.text: What kid doesn't love dinosaurs? We bought this as a first set of dinosaur toys for our 2 year old grandson, and it is great. The figures are large enough so there is no choking risk, but not so large that he can't comfortably handle 2 or 3 at once. The figures are soft enough so as to be safe, but sturdy enough to stand up to playing.
customer_reviews.author: martin76

customer_reviews.title: No sharp or pointy edges. Soft lightweight sturdy well made
customer_reviews.text: These Dinos are awesome! I wanted to get Dinos for my kid’s but the sharp pointy end of them deterred me. My 2 year old and 15 month old both love these! The are sturdy soft and big in size, but lightweight. My 15 month old has no problem carrying these around. They are fun for teething infants as they feel soft but firm. Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value! Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend! My son loves these! Bought him a set of 7” dinosaurs as well, but he immediately went for these. A great start to a dinosaur collection. They are softer plastic, but not so soft like a squeaky rubber duck. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Toddler loves them
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these. Hes only two but these are large enough that I dont have to worry about him or his sister hurting themselves with them. They are a softer rubber but I would not recommend taking them in the bath since water can get inside and possibly cause mold as with any toy. The only thing I'm not fond of is that they leave marks on the walls. But I've realized and accepted thats what toys do.
customer_reviews.author: Concerned Citizen

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son's second birthday, he's recently really gotten into dinosaurs! They seemed bigger on the review photos but we are still very pleased with them. Great price for a group of awesome dinosaurs!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Hanes

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I’m missing one of the Dinos on the photo. A++ They are very realistic and soft. My toddler loves them!! He gets pretty upset when the dinos don’t stand on their own. I’m so glad all of them do!!
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Perfect! Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I opened the box and was excited as my grandson will be! They are LARGE, rubber, colorful dinosaurs. They are pliable, not hard plastic. Most of the other dinosaurs I'd looked at were much too small. These are 12" long and 8" - 9" tall. I'm very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: Very cute set of dinosaurs which are at the same time sturdy and a bit squishy. Can be used on dry land or in the bathtub. They come in a cute and classy box for easy wrapping. These would make a perfect gift for a young child
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Items are just what i expected 3 beautiful soft dinasaurs any boy or girl would love.
customer_reviews.text: My three year old girl loves dinasaurs i have purchased quiet a few elsewhere and some more expensive. Chose these because they looked great and price is great too. After receiving glad i did they are soft compared to ones i purchased elsewhere. She loves them and even falls asleep and takes baths with them. Do recommend to purchase great item to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Great for boys and girls!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a Christmas present for my four year old, boy and girl, twins and they love them! So realistic that they were easily able to identify three out of the five different figures righy away. Not those hard, plasticy dinosaurs in the past. You could drop one of these on you foot and not break skin.
customer_reviews.author: John Preciado

customer_reviews.title: Dino WOW!
customer_reviews.text: When they say gargatuan they mean it! These Dino's are huge and my 2 year old LOVES them! These guys are not the hard plastic you find most larger dinosaurs to be- they are a soft squishy plastic good for dinosaur fights! Even my mother in law who is the director of our local libraries children's department said these would be perfect for the little ones there. The Dino's come packed nicely in an awesome box with pictures of dinosaurs know the outside that can continue to be used for storage as needed! I would definitely recommend these for toddlers and they're a great gift idea for dinosaur lovers!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Tewes

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, soft rubber - perfect for little ones
customer_reviews.text: These dinosaurs are so perfect for little ones! They are a sturdy, soft rubber. So if the kid whacks you over the head with it, it will be a minor inconvenience instead of a concussion if it were hard plastic. My 1.5 year old loves these. He roars with them, runs with them, plays everything under the son with them. Definitely a great toy all around.
customer_reviews.author: AshleyA

customer_reviews.title: One doesn’t stand up
customer_reviews.text: My son was very frustrated that his favorite dinosaur would not stand up. His legs are not the same length and are facing opposite directions.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Hammang

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought these based on other good reviews, and was not disappointed. They are hollow, and much lighter-weight than other toy dinosaurs, which I like. The quality is good, and the featured are detailed and realistic.
customer_reviews.author: Krystle

customer_reviews.title: Great Dinosaurs but One of them Tips Over
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the set of 4 dinosaurs because the set of 5 has been my son's favorite toy for most of his life. Really nice detail and texture on most of them, but the T-Rex has warped legs and won't stand up. I can't give it a good score because there is nothing more frustrating to a 3 year old boy than a tippy T-Rex!
customer_reviews.author: Lillabee

customer_reviews.title: My 2yo loves this set
customer_reviews.text: My son (2yo) absolutely loves these dinosaurs. They are a softer rubber and slightly squeezable so he can hold them better. They stand up and balance really well and he can easily put them on their feet and not be constantly frustrated with them falling over.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: There durable
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my 3yr old grandson. He loved the dinosaurs. There very durable. My 3 grandkids will love these for years. There not the real hard ones, there soft texture, but strong.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Dinosaurs!!! Fun!!! Safe???
customer_reviews.text: My 3&1 years old boys just love these fellas!! They play with these dinosaurs at everywhere! I might need to buy one more set because two boys fight too much while playing lol and also very safe for my one years old boy. We used have plastic dinosaurs and these sharp plastic tails and fingers were not safe for my little one But these dinosaurs are soft and big :) very safe and fun for kids!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these. They have the names on the bottom which we like. We got the one with 4 dinosaurs which included the tRex, and triceratops. We also have the one with the 3 dinosaurs and love them both.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Excellent toy for dinosaur lovers
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old grandson loved the dinosaurs. They are good quality and sturdy yet soft enough to be able to play with easily. He enjoys having the set so that he can act the dinosaurs fighting.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality all around.
customer_reviews.text: Comes in a great box that was really nice - perfect for toys from Santa. The reviews are spot on about the quality of the dinosaurs. We got some from a local toy store as well. One of those cost the same as all these and these were of equal quality
customer_reviews.author: getch739

customer_reviews.title: Kid friendly  soft dinos
customer_reviews.text: One if the dinosaurs is misshapen. Its face is caved in and its feet & legs are both messed up ad well. The other ones are in good shape. The kids like playing with them. We like that they are soft.
customer_reviews.author: Mycloud9

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 3 year old.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for his birthday. They are a soft rubber, yet flexible. about 12inches tall or wide. Exactly what i was looking for. He plays hard with these dino's and they are with standing the torture! I would buy these again!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Sturdy Toys
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old son wanted a brontosaurus toy. I looked at several that were barely any bigger, but at the same price as this whole set. I'm glad I got the set. He's got his brontosaurus and four other excellent sturdy, and reasonably large dinosaur toys. He loves them. They are bath safe. Can be easily washed. Great for playing out in the yard. Should last forever given normal conditions. Will definitely buy from this company again!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Harestad

customer_reviews.title: Biggest dinos available
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a cool toy dino set that didn't have built in noises. These are great because not only are the large, but they're soft too. Not plush like a stuffed animal, but the jaws can be made to close and the torsos can be squeezed. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Van Berg

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Toddler
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my 3yr as Bday gift let me just say he hasn't stopped playing with them...He had others he liked to play pretend with and usually just about took out mine and his dads eyes because they were to hard, these on the other hand are awesome. The detailing is great the material is great and they were actually larger than I expected. For the price I would buy them again!
customer_reviews.author: nikki herndon

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. My sons love their dinosaurs. They are 12" in length not Iin height which was the only misleading thing. Other than that. I love them
customer_reviews.author: Adriana

customer_reviews.title: Some dinosaurs in the set do not stand upright.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love these, but was disappointed that two of the dinosaurs had legs that were different lengths, therefore, they don’t stand upright & just lay on their sides on the floor. The other three dinosaurs stand upright just fine. My son plays with those, so I’m grateful for that.
customer_reviews.author: EK2112

customer_reviews.title: Good but far from perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set specifically for the spinosaurus. Of course, that ends up being the one that is the most deformed and doesn't always stand up. Good quality on the rest of the dinos doesn't make up for that, I'm afraid.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: My great grandson gives them two thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: These were a birthday gift for a dino loving young man. He was completely taken with them and plays with them daily. Very happy with the timeliness of delivery. Will use this brand and vendor again.
customer_reviews.author: John Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great size, variety!
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Rough 2 year tested. Mother approved. Great variety of dinosaurs 🦖 🦕 and colors. Love the nice big but not huge size. Great value. Will buy for fiends kids as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 2.5 year old
customer_reviews.text: My 2.5 year old loves these. She takes them to the park and throws them down the slide and puts them in trees to eat the leaves. They are still in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Honeyofsonny

customer_reviews.title: Good and safe toys!
customer_reviews.text: The Stanisaurus dinosaur is defective and cannot be played with since one of the rear legs is shorter than the other. I am elderly and bought them for my grandchildren. I cannot return the item but feel you should know the product is defective. Clairerich16@verizon.net THIS IS MY THIRD SUBMISSION OF THE REVIEW - ENOUGH ALREADY!
customer_reviews.author: claire richardson

customer_reviews.title: Great value 2 year old loves them except velociraptor
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old loves them! Soft and now she has dinosaurs of her own! She’s a little scared of the velociraptor for some reason but she hugs the Trex and brachiosaurus!
customer_reviews.author: Cube Dweller

customer_reviews.title: Good size!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these as a gift for my daughter. She had been asking for “pink dinosaurs” so I got these and painted them pinks, purples and added glitter. Pictured are a few I painted. I was very impressed by the quality of these toys and loved how they came originally as well. I just had to make them a little girlier for her like she had asked.
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful buy
customer_reviews.text: Soft, flexible plastic. Realistic look. Name of dinosaur on body. Just love these dinosaurs more than any of the others we’ve bought. We have brought many due to our younger grandkids love them.
customer_reviews.author: francine urrutia-diaz

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my 3 great grandchildren who are at the age where they seem to love dinosaurs. These dinosaurs are soft versus hard plastic and they’re durable. My great grandchildren loved them and played with them for hours.
customer_reviews.author: church girl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for little ones!
customer_reviews.text: It’s so hard to find Dino’s appropriate for the 1-2 year age group outside of plush, these are incredible! We’re gifting them to my nephew and ordering another set for our 2.5 year old who saw them and loved them!
customer_reviews.author: KimCorv

customer_reviews.title: They’re perfect for my new toddler
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my almost 2 year old son. The size is perfect and I love how soft they are but also sturdy enough to be “rough” with them. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: April V Ayala

customer_reviews.title: Great dinos
customer_reviews.text: Great toy for your child who loves dinosaurs! I haven’t given it to my son yet as his birthday is this fall but he loves dinos and these are just the perfect size not to small not to big and perfect material for him to not poke an eye out.
customer_reviews.author: olivia carril

customer_reviews.title: GREAT DINO SET
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old LOVES these. We play with them every day. They’re a great size and sort of squishy so you don’t have to worry about you or your kids getting hurt if they throw one (toddlers).
customer_reviews.author: MamaW

customer_reviews.title: Big and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My son has played with these every day not just around the house but outside in the rocks and dirt and he’s bathed with them a few times. He LOVES them.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Sneed

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: Super impressed! These dinosaurs are huge, and i was expecting them to be heavy and rock hard. A bit nervous to give thrm to our 18 mo old. But there perfect.. semi soft but not so much that you can bend them. Absolutely zero toxic plastic smell or odor. Will be ordering more of this brand to add to the collection.
customer_reviews.author: alicia

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy Niece!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set as a Christmas gift for my great niece (she's completely obsessed with dinosaurs 🥰) and she loves them!! They are a great size, very realistic and the material is not that painfully hard plastic stuff. They are very durable and sturdy though. I would definitely recommend these, they were perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Lala

customer_reviews.title: Softer than any other toy dinosaur I have come across in stores.
customer_reviews.text: I went searching for dinosaur toys for my toddler daughter who loves dinosaurs. It was important to me to find ones that were not made of hard plastic, as the pointy edges on those can really hurt if she fell on them while playing. These did not disappoint and have held up well so far. She loves them. I love them. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and great look.
customer_reviews.text: Wow! 2 year old Australian grandson saw on FaceTime and tried plucking them into his hands! He can’t wait to play with them. The dinosaurs are perfect sized and beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Love shopping Online!

customer_reviews.title: Fan of dinosaur
customer_reviews.text: My kid became a fan of dinosaurs after watching the movie “ the good dinosaur”. He plays with them more then any other toy. They’re perfect size, not too big or too small. Arrived on time and they’re not made out or hard plastic.
customer_reviews.author: shrinath parimi

customer_reviews.title: Great for young children!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for my toddler grandson. They are a good size, and look wonderfully ferocious (which he will love :-D) BUT they don't have sharp points or sharp edges.
customer_reviews.author: Dulcinea of the stacks

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Just received the Boley Gargantuan Dinosaur Playset. They are a beautiful well-made set! I purchased this for my two-year-old grandson. The quality of these play dinosaurs are great and I’m sure they will last for many years to come. One thing I was especially impressed with was the names of the dinosaurs are on the bottom of the feet. This is extremely helpful to a grandmother . They are big, soft but not too soft, and the colors are beautiful. Very happy with my purchase. Thank you !
customer_reviews.author: Deb Robling

product_meta.title: Boley 5 Piece Jumbo Dinosaur Set - Kids, Children, Toddlers Highly Detailed, Realistic Toy Set for Dinosaur Lovers - Perfect for Party Favors, Birthday Gifts, and More
feature_bullets: WHAT'S INSIDE: Boley's 5 Piece Jumbo Dinosaur Set includes the following mighty dinosaurs: T-Rex, Gigantosaurus, Triceratops, Brachiosaurus, and Spinosaurus. This jumbo dinosaur set includes realistic, colorful dinosaur figures that are durable and made from high-quality material. Guarantee your child endless imaginative fun in both indoor and outdoor settings!

PERFECT EDUCATIONAL GIFT: Boley's 5 Piece Jumbo Dinosaur Set will spark hours of creative and imaginative play as your children play with legendary creatures from prehistoric times! Give your child a head start on vocabulary development by having them learn the names of all the different dinosaurs in the Jurassic World! These dinosaurs are perfect as party packs, party favors, or birthday gifts!

CHILD FRIENDLY & ALWAYS SAFE: As a global toy company, Boley's #1 priority is child safety. All of our toys are always 100% nontoxic, 100% lead-free, and 100% free of phthalates. We adhere to US and ASTM safety standards, rigorously test our toys, and have our toys certified by independent labs for quality assurance. Boley proudly supports the standards established by ASTM, SCAN, BSCI, SMETA, Sedex, ICTI Care, and more. Please note this particular toy is designed for children ages 3 and up.

SATISFACTION GUARANTEED: When you purchase a toy from Boley, you purchase more than just a high-quality educational toy - you gain confidence knowing Boley will always provide you with amazing customer service. If for any reason, your purchase requires service or you have questions, you can contact Amazon directly for a replacement or refund, or contact Boley by clicking "Sold by Boley Corporation" and then clicking on the "Ask A Question" button for helpful and friendly customer service!

LOOKING FOR MORE? Boley offers a diverse variety of kids' toys on Amazon. From play kitchen sets with food, pretend play cash register sets, toy banking sets with play money, dollhouses, race cars and toy trucks, fun bath toys, construction sets, legendary dinosaur sets, and other learning lootboxes, Boley has you covered! Simply search "Boley" or click on our store name to find the hundreds of educational and action-packed toys we offer to bring life, love, and laughter to families everywhere!
